title: Release Notes Changes Schema
description: Schema for the list of changes in release notes

type.description: Type of change following conventional commit types

module.description: Highest level module if change is within src directory

files.description: List of all file paths that relate to the change

summary.description: Summary of the change in imperative mood

content.description: Long form descriptions of the changes and update instructions if breaking change. Code references should be in formated as code using backticks, e.g., `code`, or code blocks.

breaking.description: Whether this is a breaking change that may break existing code or change behavior
